text: @PresidencyZA @CyrilRamaphosa I hope the members of the NCC wont  misrepresent the sentiments on the ground...no man wants to queue up for hours to claim a food voucher on a regular basis... it's important open up the economy in a phased approach... Covid-19 risk is very low if one sticks to the basics...
